plot: A Nigerian man, new to America, works in a dead end job and lives with his brother and his wife. In his search for a new job, he rediscovers what truly makes him happy.
title: Okechukwu
plot_es: A Nigerian man, new to America, works in a dead end job and lives with his brother and his wife. In his search for a new job, he rediscovers what truly makes him happy.
plot_en: A Nigerian man, new to America, works in a dead end job and lives with his brother and his wife. In his search for a new job, he rediscovers what truly makes him happy.
